text.text_translated:
Pi is 16 years old.
People choose a new government.
Pi's parents do not support this government.
So, Pi's parents are worried about the future.
They close their zoo.
They decide to leave their country and go to Canada.
They sell some animals to zoos in North America.
The family travels on a ship to Canada.
They take other animals with them.
On the way, there is a terrible storm.
The ship goes down in the water.
Sadly, Pi's family and the ship's sailors die in the water.
But Pi is in a lifeboat.
A lifeboat is a small boat. It helps people when a big ship has an accident.
He is with a hyena, a zebra, and an orang-utan.
He is also with a huge tiger.
